title: Hating the Player
description: Gavin Leonard is the worst.He lives in the best party house off campus at Valley U, overrun by jocks galore.I live next door, watching Jane Austen adaptations with my sketchbook in hand.He stays on his side of the fence.I stay on mine.Now we're accidentally on a camping trip together, but there's only one tent left.Gavin Leonard is the worst.And he's the last guy who broke my heart.
author: Rebecca Jenshak
